short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the fury of the Warhammer universe with the Evil Blood live wallpaper, featuring a clock and Google search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features
Live Wallpaper:
High-resolution visuals depicting a dark, blood-soaked Warhammer battlefield.

Minimalist Design:
A clean layout that complements the intense imagery.

Integrated Clock:
Keep track of time with a stylish, built-in clock.

Google Search Bar:
Conveniently search the web directly from your new tab.

Dark and Epic:
Captures the chaos and intensity of the Warhammer universe.

Optimized Performance:
Lightweight and smooth, ensuring a flawless browsing experience.

Perfect for Warhammer Fans:
Celebrate the grandeur and darkness of Warhammer with every new tab you open.
